<c8y-drop-area
  (dropped)="onFileDroppedEvent($event)"
  [accept]="'.zip'"
  [files]="fileList"
  [loading]="uploadInProgress"
  [maxAllowedFiles]="1"
  [message]="'Upload a *.zip file' | translate"
  [progress]="uploadProgress | async"
  [forceHideList]="true"
  class="drop-area-sm"
>
